song.title: Follow me sunsample 3 mix
song.info:
Lyrics: There is a party where we're all gonna be, Just bring your friends and some joyful memories You're gonna like it there my friends, trust in me, Come follow me now, down to BITLive 3
Come, follow me! Follow me back in time!
C64 play my favourite melodies, Play it on cd, mc, mp3 Everybody set the 8-bit spirit free, Enjoy yourself down at BITLive 3
Come, follow me! Follow me back in time!
